channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom
channel.desc: Cumulo tries to help True fix the BoatyFloat; when True tries to do too much herself, Cumulo shrinks in sadness; True realizes she needs her friends' help to save the day.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: When Pants the puppy goes to a family wedding, he realizes that because he's adopted, every member of his family but him is a bunny.

channel.desc: Paddington makes Goo, but struggles to keep his promise to not make a mess when things get out of control.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Just for Laughs: Gags
channel.desc: There's no sound, but there sure are plenty of laughs. This crazy Quebec-based troupe uses the city as its stage, and its inhabitants, or victims, as characters! People are caught in a twisted yet funny web of comedic deception. This updated "Candid Camera" is a tad more risque and a little kookier with its practical jokes. The little snippets last only a few minutes, and some look more painful than others.

channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch investigates after a rare skull is stolen and an interested buyer is murdered.
